post.description:
Request a download url for a subtitle. 


> The download count is calculated on this action, not the file download itself

<!-- theme: warning -->

> ### Warning
>
> The download URL is temporary, and cannot be used more than 3 hours, so do not cache it, but you can download the file more than once if needed.

200.description: Request a download url for a subtitle.

get.description:
Find subtitle for a video file. All parameters can be combined following various logics: searching by a specific external id (imdb, tmdb), a file moviehash, or a simple text query

> For best results with automatic searching based on file analysis, send the file name as a query together with the moviehash

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the movie or episode

parameters.name: imdb_id
parameters.description: IMDB ID of the movie or episode

parameters.name: tmdb_id
parameters.description: TMDB ID of the movie or episode

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: To be used alone - for user uploads listing

parameters.name: order_by
parameters.description: Order of the returned results, accept any of above fields

parameters.name: order_direction
parameters.description: Order direction of the returned results (asc,desc)

200.description: Find subtitles for a video file

Corrected the I (capital i) for l (lower case L) in hdtv-fan''s sub.
Corrected subtitle for the movie The Departed. Adjusted for the viewing on PC Version platforms and 'Sony DVP NS708HP'.
The two CDs of The.Departed.DVDRip.XviD-PUKKA joined in one file.
English subtitles for the ShitBusters release.

Heb de *.sub file middels OCR omgezet naar *.srt file. De time stamps zijn 100% in orde. De tekst dient hier en daar aangepast te worden! Mocht iemand zich geroepen voelen de zaak in het Nederlands te vertalen, be my guest...

get.description:
Search for a Feature from a simple text input. Typically used for a text search or autocomplete.

<!-- theme: warning -->

> ### Watch Out!
>
> If you create an autocomplete, don't set a too small refresh limit, remember you must not go over 40 requests per 10 seconds!

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: empty to list all, movie, tvshow or episode.
